channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiManager, FortiAnalyzer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiManager, FortiAnalyzer

item.title: CVE-2020-12811|2024-08-04T12:04:22.888Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortimanager%2C%20fortianalyzer
item.description: An improper neutralization of script-related HTML tags in a web page in FortiManager 6.2.0, 6.2.1, 6.2.2, and 6.2.3and FortiAnalyzer 6.2.0, 6.2.1, 6.2.2, and 6.2.3 may allow an attacker to execute a cross site scripting (XSS) via the Identify Provider name field.

item.title: CVE-2021-36170|2024-08-04T00:47:43.941Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortimanager%2C%20fortianalyzer
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability [CWE-200] in FortiAnalyzerVM and FortiManagerVM versions 7.0.0 and 6.4.6 and below may allow an authenticated attacker to read the FortiCloud credentials which were used to activate the trial license in cleartext.
